:py:mod:`skpm.event_feature_extraction.targets`
===============================================

.. py:module:: skpm.event_feature_extraction.targets


Module Contents
---------------


Functions
~~~~~~~~~

.. autoapisummary::

   skpm.event_feature_extraction.targets.next_activity
   skpm.event_feature_extraction.targets.remaining_time



.. py:function:: next_activity(log: pandas.DataFrame)

   Returns the next activity of each trace.

   :param log: An event log.
   :type log: pd.DataFrame

   :returns: A dataframe with the next activity of each trace.
   :rtype: pd.DataFrame


.. py:function:: remaining_time(log: pandas.DataFrame)

   Returns the remaining time of each trace.

   :param log: An event log.
   :type log: pd.DataFrame

   :returns: A dataframe with the remaining time of each trace.
   :rtype: pd.DataFrame
